works.name: VisionForge
works.description: Collaborative application for managing, training, and tracking machine learning models: dataset organization, training configuration, performance visualization, real-time collaboration, and simplified model deployment.
works.context: Facilitating access to artificial intelligence within the company by raising awareness of its uses, democratizing AI tools, and promoting their adoption. The objective is to increase productivity through AI solutions adapted to business needs, while supporting the transformation of internal practices.
tasks: Design and improvement of user experience and graphical interface to make the application intuitive and accessible
Deployment of the application on AWS, management of production and staging environments, automation of updates
Implementation and maintenance of continuous integration and deployment pipelines to automate tests, build, and deployment
Development of user interfaces, component integration, and interaction with backend API
Code refactoring and optimization to improve readability, maintainability, and performance
Selection of technologies and architectures adapted to business needs and technical constraints
Creation and management of containers to ensure portability, isolation, and scalability of services
Design and implementation of microservices architecture to modularize the application and facilitate its evolution
